#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

struct node
{
	char c;
	int f;
}aplh[26];

bool comp(const struct node &x,const struct node &y)
{
	return (x.f == y.f)?(x.c < y.c):(x.f > y.f);
}

int main()
{
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
	{
		aplh[i].c = (char)(i+97);
		aplh[i].f = 0;
		int ct=0;
		for(int j=0;j<s.length();j++)
		{
			if(s[j] == aplh[i].c)
				while(s[j] == aplh[i].c)
				{
					ct++;
					j++;
				}
			if(aplh[i].f < ct)
				aplh[i].f = ct;
			ct = 0;
		}
	}
	sort(aplh,aplh+26,comp);
	cout<<aplh[0].c<<endl<<aplh[0].f<<endl;
	return 0;	
}
